27.name: Elemental Slayer
27.description: Fire, earth, lightning, water, and ice can't stand up to steel and magic.

42.name: Nightmare Court's Bane
42.description: Haunt these evil sylvari like a bad dream.
42.requirement: Kill  members of the Nightmare Court.

55.name: Mace Master
55.description: Blunt force trauma is your friend, and you enjoy sharing it with your enemies.
55.requirement: Deliver  killing blows with a mace.

bits.text: Armorsmith
Tailor
Leatherworker
Jeweler
Cook
Weaponsmith
Huntsman
Artificer

202.name: Vizier's Tower
202.description: Climb the heights of the Vizier's Tower.

249.name: Avenger
249.description: You're making a name for yourself.

316.name: Nice View From Up Here
316.description: The walls are nearly as tough as you are.

516.name: Champion Slayer
516.description: Defeat champion foes where you find them.

520.name: Monthly Successful Events
520.description: A friend and hero to all.

548.name: Bachelor of Pioneering
548.description: Left, left, left, left...wait a minute.
548.requirement: Find the shortcut located in World 1, Zone 2.

561.name: Minor in Achievement
561.description: ...And complete a senior capstone project on bauble theory.

563.name: Glutton for Punishment
563.requirement: Complete Zone 1, Zone 2, and Zone 3 in World 1 in Tribulation Mode.

bits.text: Zone 01
Zone 02
Zone 03

571.name: Alliance Breaker
571.requirement: Complete the following achievements for Flame and Frost: Refugee Volunteer, Lost and Found, the Gathering Storm, Secret Contact, and Avenger of the Dispossessed.

bits.text: Refugee Volunteer
The Gathering Storm
Lost and Found
Secret Contact
Avenger of the Dispossessed

737.name: Aspect Arena: Crystal Capper
737.description: Bet you can't say "Crystal Capper" ten times in a row, fast.
737.requirement: Capture crystals for your team's side in Aspect Arena.

804.name: Triple Threat
804.requirement: Win  third tier matches with three active gambits.

835.name: Worldwide Invasion Responder
835.requirement: Completely stop one of Scarlet's portal attacks in Gendarran Fields.

855.name: Grandmaster Weaponsmith
855.requirement: Reach rating  in the weaponsmith discipline.

915.name: Twilight Triumphant
915.requirement: Complete all Twilight Arbor dungeon paths.

921.name: Unshippable
921.description: The skies should be more friendly now.
921.requirement: Sabotage the Aetherblade ships during the Twilight Assault.

994.name: WvW Premier Season: 4th Place
994.requirement: Win your league in a WvW Season.

1004.name: Containment
1004.requirement: You stood by Tassi's side as she tried to contain the reliquary.

1018.name: Death to the Undying
1018.requirement: Defeat the Skeletal Lich in Mad King's Maze.

1118.name: Tower Antitoxin Injector
1118.requirement: Inject  dose of antitoxin to into the heart of the tower.

1246.name: Wintersday Wrecking Ball
1246.description: Nothing a little tape and some glue can't fix.
1246.requirement: Destroy every miniature piece of Tixx's toy diorama in Tixx's Infinirarium. (Dungeon instance only; not in the Toypocalypse activity.)

1277.name: Wintersday Skritt Hit III
1277.description: Give those stealers a snowball sandwich.
1277.requirement: Hit  skritt with snowballs anywhere in Tyria.

1302.name: Three Total Team Arena Wins
1302.requirement: Win  Team Arena Match in PvP

1639.name: Prospect Valley Crash Site Climber
1639.description: Climb wreckage to reach the highest peak in Prospect Valley.

1640.name: Zephyr's Ascent
1640.requirement: Climb to the highest point in Prospect Valley.

1644.name: Explosive Avoidance
1644.requirement: Don't get hit by your enemy's timed blasts.

1659.name: Entanglement
1659.requirement: Follow Scarlet's trail to uncover what she was after in Dry Top.

1670.name: Toxicity Trampler
1670.requirement: Defeat the Mordrem champion in Iron Marches without being poisoned.

1739.name: Dreamthistle Weapon Collection
1739.description: <c=@flavor>Pay tribute to your fallen comrades that were involved in bringing down the Nightmare Tower.</c>
1739.requirement: Unlock all  Dreamthistle weapon skins in your wardrobe.

1754.name: Koutalophile
1754.description: <c=@flavor>They are so much more than cutlery!</c>
1754.requirement: Collect all of the spoon trinkets of Tyria.
1754.locked_text: Purchase a Collectible Spoon Box from Master Collector Rednax Youngblood in Lion's Arch.

1755.name: World Contributor Round 1
1755.requirement: Participate in round one of the tournament. Complete any  WvW event this week.

1856.name: Daily PvP Reward Earner
1856.requirement: Earn  reward from a PvP Reward Track.

1895.name: Daily Shaman's Rookery Jumping Puzzle
1895.requirement: Complete the Shaman's Rookery jumping puzzle in Wayfarer Foothills.

1952.name: Daily Fields of Ruin Event Completer
1952.requirement: Complete events in the Fields of Ruin in Ascalon.

1962.name: Daily Iron Marches Event Completer
1962.requirement: Complete events in the Iron Marches in Ascalon.

1981.name: Daily Ascalon Miner
1981.description: Fueling the engines of the economy.
1981.requirement: Gather raw materials by mining ore in the following Ascalon maps: Plains of Ashford, Diessa Plateau, Fields of Ruin, Blazeridge Steppes, Iron Marches, and Fireheart Rise.

2103.name: Daily Ranger or Engineer Winner
2103.requirement: Win  PvP match as a ranger or engineer.

2109.name: Daily Engineer or Mesmer Winner
2109.requirement: Win  PvP match as an engineer or mesmer.

2156.name: Master of the Molten Ore
2156.requirement: Only use four buckets during the boss encounter of the Underground Facility fractal.

2254.name: Weed Whacker
2254.requirement: Defeat 30 Mordrem during the night attack.

2268.name: Astralaria IV: The Cosmos
2268.description: The heavens have aligned to support you in your quest! Chart their places within the heavens to discern their wisdom, and defeat the Elder Dragons and their spawn that threaten the world. Complete these tasks, and earn the Gift of the Cosmos, the penultimate step in attaining the legendary axe known as Astralaria.

bits.text: Take the Sextant, Astrolabe, Incomplete Star Charts, and Star Charter's Bag along with Ogden's Notes to the Durmand Priory, and use the Cartographer's Workbench to create the Celestial Cartographer's Gear.
Take the Counterweighting Mechanism, Dredge Cogs, Magnification Lens, and Hollow Saurian Bone to the Durmand Priory and use the Cartographer's Workbench to craft a Sextant.

Take the Ancient Charting Device, Ancient Planetarium Slide, Finely Tuned Watchwork Mechanism, and Flawless Ancient Karka Husk to the Durmand Priory and use the Cartographer's Workbench to craft an Astrolabe.
Found in the chest inside the treasure room of the Collapsed Observatory in Kessex Hills.
Purchase this recipe from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.
Purchase this recipe from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.
Found by looting the Champion Dredge Commissar at Tribulation Rift in Dredgehaunt Cliffs.
Found by looting the Eye of Zhaitan while helping the Pact capture the Promenade of the Gods in Cursed Shore.
Occasionally looted from saurians in Auric Basin.
Found in the chest after defeating the statue of Dwayna located at the Cathedral of Zephyrs in Malchor's Leap.
Found in chest after defeating the Legendary Risen High Wizard in Cursed Shore.
Purchase this recipe from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.
Found in the chest after defeating the Legendary Karka Queen in Southsun Cove.
Occasionally found while looting a krait's possessions.
Looted from the Mossman in the Swampland Fractal.
Found in the treasure room of the Windy Cave in Lornar's Pass.
Speak with Ogden in the Durmand Priory in Lornar's Pass to get his notes.
Take the long way around to loot this from the Grand Chest near Fryxx in Straits of Devastation.
Found in the chest at the end of the Aetherblade Fractal.
Purchase this recipe from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.
Combine the four human star charts into the Human Constellation Chapter.
During the night, use the Celestial Cartographer's Gear near the chest at the top of the Vizier's Tower in the Straits of Devastation to chart the human constellation Eye of Grenth.
During the night, use the Celestial Cartographer's Gear near the Sylvan Chest after uncovering the secrets of the hidden garden in Mount Maelstrom to chart the human constellation, Gnarl of Melandru.
During the night, use the Celestial Cartographer's Gear at Balthazar's Rest in Auric Basin.
During the night, use the Celestial Cartographer's Gear in the Ossan Quarter of Divinity's Reach.
Combine the four charr star charts into the Charr Constellation Chapter.
Use the Celestial Cartographer's Gear near the chest after completing the Urban Battleground Fractal.
During the night, use the Celestial Cartographer's Gear near the chest at the end of Wall Breach Blitz in Diessa Plateau.
During the night, use the Celestial Cartographer's Gear at Steeleye Span in Blazeridge Steppes.
During the night, climb up to the canopy in Verdant Brink to the Pact wreckage above Stonetwist Paths and use the Celestial Cartographer's Gear near the Maguuma Mastery Insight.
Combine the four norn star charts into the Norn Constellation Chapter.
During the night, use the Celestial Cartographer's Gear near Shifting Waves, who stands in Snow Climb at Frostgorge Sound.
During the night, use the Celestial Cartographer's Gear near the chest of the Griffonrook Run in Lornar's Pass.
During the night, use the Celestial Cartographer's Gear near the chest of the Tribulation Rift Scaffolding in Dredgehaunt Cliffs.
During the night, use the Celestial Cartographer's Gear near the chest at the Shattered Ice Ruins in Frostgorge Sound.
Combine the Magic of the Elder Dragons, Power of the Ley Lines, Energy from the Mists, and a Vision Crystal to create the Cosmic Power.
After gathering the four elder dragons' magic, combine them into the Magic of the Elder Dragons.
Obtained from the chest after defeating Tequatl the Sunless in Sparkfly Fen.
Obtained from the chest after defeating Claw of Jormag in Frostgorge Sound.
Obtained from the chest after defeating the Shatterer in Blazeridge Steppes.
Obtained from the chest after defeating Mordremoth in Dragon's Stand.
Combine the four energies to create the Power of the Ley Lines.
Energy gathered from earning a rank of silver or better in the Ley-Line Run adventure in Tangled Depths.
Energy gathered while ley-line gliding through the Ley-Line Confluence in Tangled Depths.
Energy gathered by earning rank silver or better in the Wings of Gold adventure located inside Auric Basin.
Energy gathered from communing with the hero challenge point near Serenity's Cove in Dragon's Stand.
Combine the four Mists energies to create the Energy from the Mists.
An artifact full of Mists energy found in the chest after defeating the Jade Maw in the Solid Ocean Fractal.
Mists energy found by communing with the Temple of Ages hero challenge in Queensdale.
A wisp of Foefire and Mists energy occasionally found when killing those cursed by the Foefire.
An artifact laced with Mists energy, granted by Sage Salim in the Forgotten City of Tarir in Auric Basin after training the Exalted Acceptance Mastery ability.
Purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs after training the Scholar of Secrets ability in the Legendary Crafting Mastery Track.

2274.name: Revenant: Invocation
2274.requirement: Complete the Invocation revenant specialization to unlock the Mistward Legguards collection.

2379.name: Still Faster Than Light
2379.requirement: Complete Kleptotronic Advanced Designs without being hit by lasers.

2476.name: Dark Harvest
2476.requirement: Collect these  items and skins to receive the reaper's greatsword, Dark Harvest.
2476.locked_text: Begin training the necromancer's reaper elite specialization.

bits.text: Created in the Mystic Forge.
Earn bronze or better in this adventure.
Requires training Stealth Gliding in the Gliding Mastery line.
Purchased from Itzel vendors for airship parts.
Found on ore nodes in Auric Basin. Requires training Exalted Gathering in the Exalted Lore Mastery line.
Defeat a Treasure Mushroom. Requires training Nuhoch Stealth Detection in the Nuhoch Lore Mastery line.
Completely unlock the elite specialization.
Created from a plated weapon purchased for crystalline ore in Dragon's Stand.

2599.name: Egg Run
2599.description: Be quick, but be careful. Also, be quick!
2599.requirement: Deliver a wyvern egg to Utogi in less than 5 seconds.

2613.name: Honorary Ogre
2613.description: The ogres consider you one of their own. In this case, that's a compliment.
2613.requirement: Participate in every stage of the ogres' survival in Tangled Depths.

bits.text: Helped Nokta Scout Chak
Collected Chak Eggs
Destroyed Ley-Combs
Killed Enraged Chak
Escorted Ogres to Blighting Tree
Fought Mordrem with Ogres

2633.name: Sanctum Scramble: Silver
2633.requirement: Jump, launch, and glide your way through the checkpoints and across the finish line!

2732.name: League Elementalist—Recruit
2732.description: Completing this achievement advances the League Professional—Recruit achievement.
2732.requirement: Win 5 ranked matches as an elementalist.

2777.name: Frozen Claw
2777.description: Even dragon lieutenants get cranky around the holidays.
2777.requirement: Defeat the Claw of Jormag  times during Wintersday.

2797.name: Medic!
2797.description: The only time it's wise to run toward the sound of mortars.
2797.requirement: Provide med kits to your allies using the mortars or the glider bomber kit.

2813.name: Crystal Clear
2813.description: Break them before they break you!
2813.requirement: Break  people out of crystal prisons created by the Shatterer.

2863.name: Environmental Science 202
2863.requirement: Smash the tree stump in World 2, Zone 2 of Super Adventure Box.

2876.name: Course Work: Super Adventure Festival
2876.requirement: Complete three daily achievements in Super Adventure Box. Completion will earn progress in the Course Load achievement, located in the Super Adventure Box: Nostalgia achievement tab.

2897.name: Daily Tier 3 Urban Battleground
2897.requirement: Complete Urban Battleground at fractal scale 51 or higher.

2938.name: Daily Ruined City of Arah
2938.requirement: Complete any path in the Ruined City of Arah explorable dungeon.

2939.name: Daily Tier 4 Uncategorized
2939.requirement: Complete Uncategorized at fractal scale 76 or higher.

2978.name: Daily Tier 1 Captain Mai Trin Boss
2978.requirement: Complete Captain Mai Trin Boss at fractal scale 1 or higher.

2995.name: Magic Dispersed
2995.requirement: Defeat  coalescences to disperse their magic back to the ley-lines.

3033.name: Shana's Ambition
3033.description:
<c=@flavor>"If I can pull this off, my career is set!"
—Shana</c>
3033.requirement: In Snowden Drifts, successfully stop the Inquest from capturing  ley-line coalescences after contributing ley energy to the Consortium.

3154.name: Candy Corn Crusher
3154.requirement: Defeat the Grand High Viscount of Candy Corn in Mad King's Labyrinth.

3167.name: Halloween Fright
3167.requirement: Complete three of the available daily achievements in a single day in the Halloween festival. Completion will earn progress in the Eve of the Mad King achievement, located in the Halloween achievement tab.

3276.name: Firecracker Finder
3276.requirement: Find and light all of the firecrackers in the Crown Pavilion.

3372.name: Breaking the Siege
3372.requirement: Assist the Seraph and the people of Lake Doric.

3394.name: Beastslayer Weapon Collection
3394.requirement: Unlock all  Beastslayer weapon skins in your wardrobe.

3424.name: Wurm Slurper
3424.description: Yet another victim of the bloodstone fad diet.
3424.requirement: Slay the champion bloodstone-charged lava wurm in Heathen's Hold.

3442.name: "Flashpoint" Mastery
3442.description: Out of the frying pan, into the volcano.

3493.name: Graffiti Artist
3493.description:
Story Instance: "Where's Balthazar?"

"Don't you think it would look better like this?"
3493.requirement: Destroy a statue in the hideout.

3508.name: Siren's Landing Insight: Dwayna's Tears
3508.requirement: Discover this Mastery Insight in Siren's Landing.

3574.name: Crystal Oasis Griffon Master: Silver
3574.requirement: Fly your griffon through the rings as quickly as you can!

3588.name: The Departing
3588.requirement: Find your way back to your team.

3620.name: Desolation Insight: Shattered Ravines
3620.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in the Desolation.

3623.name: Elon Riverlands Explorer
3623.description: You've explored the abundant countryside and rolling dunes of the Elon Riverlands.
3623.requirement: Explore all the areas in Elon Riverlands.

bits.text: Arid Gladefields
Augury Rock
Deadlock Sweep
Ustulate Barrens

Elon Riverbank
Shallows of Despair
The Scavengelands
Skyward Reach
Vulture Drifts
Shoals of Sovereignty
Whispering Grottos
The Quickmire

3665.name: Master Renegade
3665.requirement: Completely train the revenant's renegade elite specialization.

3685.name: Veilrender
3685.requirement: Collect these  items and skins to receive the mirage's axe, Veilrender.
3685.locked_text: Begin training the mesmer's mirage elite specialization.

bits.text: Begin training the mesmer's mirage elite specialization.
Drops from fanged ibogas in the Crystal Desert.
Purchased from Amusement Adjunct Cagri in the Garden of Seborhin, in the Domain of Vabbi.
As a mesmer, use a Mystic Coin in the wishing well in the Garden of Seborhin, in the Domain of Vabbi.
Complete the bounty for Dunechaser in the Necropolis in the Domain of Vabbi
Purchased from Keeper Pamir at Torment's Watch in the Desolation.
Complete a race event as a mesmer in any Crystal Desert map.
Found when identifying gear, or purchased from the Black Lion Trading Post.
Escort Priest Bashshar from the Northern Way Station to the Temple of Kormir in the Crystal Oasis.
Explore the Deadhouse in the Elon Riverlands with your jackal.
Drops for mesmers from caffeinated skritt in any Crystal Desert map.
Completely train the mesmer's mirage elite specialization.
Earn map complete on any Crystal Desert map as a mesmer.
Craft with recipes purchased in the Desolation or the Domain of Vabbi.

3755.name: Desert Highlands Insight: Standstill Spire
3755.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in the Desert Highlands.

3765.name: Vehjin Supply Run: Silver
3765.requirement: Earn a silver medal or better in the Vehjin Supply Run adventure.

3836.name: Yitfei the Light
3836.requirement: Successfully answer all of the riddles posed by the fire djinn Yitfei the Light.

3858.name: Griffon Master
3858.requirement: Unlock the Aerial Finesse Mastery for griffons.

3920.name: Lunatic Court's Finery
3920.requirement: Unlock all  Lunatic armor skins in your wardrobe.

3953.name: A Legend in the Flesh
3953.requirement: Unlock  Bounty Hunter's skins in your wardrobe by crafting or using the Trading Post. Recipes can be found by completing bounties or purchased from Elisa the Traveling Researcher in the Crystal Desert.

4057.name: Dauntless Donator
4057.requirement: Get wrapped gifts from the Wintersday vendor and give them to orphans around Divinity's Reach.

4065.name: Mini Jackal Pup Collection
4065.requirement: Unlock all jackal pup miniatures in your wardrobe.

4067.name: (Annual) Light Up the Sky
4067.requirement: Set off  Lunar New Year fireworks.

4094.name: Daily Sandswept Isles Adventurer
4094.requirement: Complete an adventure within the Sandswept Isles.

4130.name: Talk to the Fist
4130.requirement: Be combative during questioning by Inquest guards.

4239.name: Daily Kourna: Plague Stopper
4239.requirement: Destroy the plague experiments in the Inquest lab.

4246.name: Loquacious Orator
4246.requirement: Hear all the arguments during the trial.

bits.text: Ask to speak.
Defend your friend's honor.
Find an error in the court's process.
Explain the circumstances.
Call out racial bias.
Ask for proof.
Tell the truth.
Ask for the councilor's trust

4251.name: The Gandaran Service Medal
4251.description: Earn foreign glory in foreign lands by spilling foreign blood.
4251.requirement: Acquire all the available medals from the Gandaran campaign.

bits.text: Shut down Inquest cannons in Kourna.
Shut down Inquest cannons in Kourna.
Shut down Inquest cannons in Kourna.
Kill the Awakened abomination in Kourna.
Reprogram a golem in Kourna.
Defend the thorn wall against the Awakened attackers in Kourna, or regrow it.
Regrow the thorn wall in Kourna, or defend it.
Defend the caravan from loyalist attackers in Kourna.
Help test an asuran "Rez-o-Matic" golem in Kourna.

4283.name: Kite Chaser
4283.requirement: Find fallen Zephyrite kite baskets throughout Tyria and loot their contents.

4297.name: Masters of Ceremony
4297.description: Ellen Kiel and Evon Gnashblade greet festivalgoers at the Sky Docks in the Labyrinthine Cliffs.
4297.requirement: Attend the opening ceremony of the Festival of the Four Winds with Ellen Kiel and Evon Gnashblade.

4455.name: Djinn's Dominion Defender
4455.description: Yasmi isn't impressed by those who cannot defend their own territory.
4455.requirement: Defeat  enemy while defending your team's capture points during rated Djinn's Dominion matches.

4481.name: Rolling Ace: Ghostfire Run
4481.requirement: Complete a lap of the roller beetle race in Diessa Plateau within the challenge time limit. (This achievement can be completed in the race event or adventure.)

4497.name: The Crystal Blooms
4497.requirement: Bear witness to a demonstration of Aurene's power.

4506.name: Branded-on-a-Stick
4506.requirement: As the instance owner, pierce four or more Branded with a single use of the Dragonsblood Spear.

4560.name: Chasing Tales: Mouglon the Watchful
4560.requirement: Acquire a Dragonsblood mace and perform tasks to re-create Mouglon's legend.

bits.text: Acquire the tome entry Chasing Tales: Mouglon the Watchful.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Mouglon: deed #1.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Mouglon: deed #2.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Mouglon: deed #3.
Meet with the spirit of Mouglon at a heroic font.

4564.name: Grand Prize
4564.requirement: Uncover hidden treasures in the resplendent dwarven treasure cache.

4621.name: Junk Debunk
4621.requirement: Help Tirabikkr look for a big nonexistent shiny at all dig-site locations.

bits.text: Sewage Dig Site
Mountain Plateau Dig Site
Shipwreck Dig Site

4685.name: Dragonfall Insight: Grenth's Teeth Coastline
4685.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in Dragonfall.

4720.name: Daily Dragonfall Mist Warden Base Builder
4720.requirement: Upgrade the camp in Melandru's Lost Domain by completing events in the area.

4769.name: Bonus Event: Meta-Event Rush
4769.description: Participate in meta-events around Tyria to earn bonus rewards!

4805.name: Coalescence III: Culmination
4805.description: Your energy friend is keenly interested in your decisions.
4805.locked_text: Available upon completion of the achievement "Coalescence II: The Gift."

5022.name: Daily Bjora Marches Eternal Ice Gatherer
5022.requirement: Gather 10 eternal ice shards in Bjora Marches.

5023.name: Legendary Voice of the Fallen and Claw of the Fallen
5023.requirement: Defeat the Voice of the Fallen and Claw of the Fallen in the Sanctum Arena.

5082.name: Party Guardian
5082.requirement: Defeat all possible threats to Grothmar's festivities.

bits.text: Devourer
Parasite Devourer
River Drake
Ghost Captain
Ghost Mage
Rogue Prisoner

5259.name: League Slayer—3v3 Season One
5259.requirement: Defeat  players in ranked matches during 3v3 Season One.

5262.name: Scorched
5262.requirement: Take down a leader inside the secret base within the time limit.

5356.name: Death to the Corrupted
5356.requirement:
Collect Charr Commendations for the legions by defeating Dominion forces and accomplishing objectives in the Drizzlewood Coast.
Speak with a quaestor in any allied base to change which legion your commendations go to.

5478.name: Champions Insight: Caledon Forest
5478.requirement: Discover this Icebrood Saga Mastery Insight in the Caledon Forest Dragon Response Mission, accessed via asura gate in Eye of the North.

5485.name: Champions Insight: Bloodtide Coast
5485.requirement: Discover this Icebrood Saga Mastery Insight in the Bloodtide Coast Dragon Response Mission, accessed via asura gate in Eye of the North.

5496.name: Top Dragon Responder: Gendarran Fields
5496.requirement: Complete  Gendarran Fields Dragon Response Mission with all challenges active.

5721.name: Second Dive: Bloodstone Fen
5721.requirement: Use the diving goggles near the highest floating island.

5725.name: Return to Recalibrating the Waypoints
5725.requirement: Complete the mission Recalibrating the Waypoints in Living World Season 2 Episode 4.

5735.name: Return to The Concordia Incident
5735.requirement: Complete the mission The Concordia Incident in Living World Season 2 Episode 2.

5792.name: Ore Miner: Lake Doric
5792.requirement: Mine ore  times in Lake Doric.

5793.name: Reconquer the Crash Site Climb
5793.requirement: Climb the wreckage site to reach the highest peak in Prospect Valley.

5839.name: Revenge of the Destroyer Twins
5839.requirement: Slay either the legendary Destroyer Aestus or the legendary Destroyer Ignis near the Boiling Sea.

5866.name: Return to Storm Tracking
5866.requirement: Complete the story mission Storm Tracking in Living World Season 4 Episode 4.

5875.name: Revenge of the Pestilent Golem
5875.requirement: Destroy the plague experiments in the Inquest lab.

5945.name: Ore Miner: Domain of Kourna
5945.requirement: Mine ore  times in the Domain of Kourna.

6009.name: Return to Primordus Rising
6009.requirement: Complete the story mission Primordus Rising in Living World Icebrood Saga Episode 5.

6049.name: Venombite Weapon Collection
6049.requirement: Unlock all  Venombite weapon skins in your wardrobe.

6056.name: League Conqueror—Conquest Season Thirty-One
6056.requirement: Win  ranked matches during Conquest Season Thirty-One.

6070.name: Seitung Province Insight: Affluent House
6070.requirement: Discover this End of Dragons Mastery Insight in Seitung Province.

6084.name: Xunlai Jade Junkyard
6084.requirement: Complete the Xunlai Jade Junkyard Strike Mission.

6102.name: Echovald Wilds Insight: House zu Heltzer
6102.requirement: Discover this End of Dragons Mastery Insight in the Echovald Wilds.

6150.name: Seitung Harbor Shenanigans
6150.description: Harbors are the temporal crossroads where life on land intersects life at sea. They remind us that existence, though often viewed in fragments, is of one whole.
6150.requirement: Successfully complete events around Seitung Harbor on Seitung Province.

bits.text: Help Hei-Ryung deliver her goods to the correct recipient.
Help Ji-Cheol deliver his goods to the correct recipient.
Find the toys stolen by the mischievous spirits.
Subdue Tae-Sung to protect the spirits of Zen Daijun.
Stop the extremist Speakers from binding the spirits.
Escort the ritualist to the main temple in Zen Daijun.

6178.name: Catch Me If You Can
6178.requirement: Defeat the Jade Maw without getting struck by its tentacles.

6195.name: Repair Crew Royale
6195.requirement: Complete repair crew escort events in the north and south of New Kaineng.

bits.text: North Repair Crew Escort
South Repair Crew Escort

6225.name: Laser Light Footed
6225.requirement: Make it through the defenses without being hit by laser or shock-wave turrets.

6242.name: Crow Catcher
6242.requirement: Use your springer to catch every crow in Grub Lane.

6260.name: Tsunami Dodger
6260.requirement: Avoid getting struck by Soo-Won's full-sized tsunamis by standing behind the crystals 10 times.

6285.name: Cultures of Echovald: The Kurzicks
6285.requirement: Participate in all the events related to Kurzick culture.

bits.text: Assist archaeologists in extracting Kurzick relics from their magical wards.
Stop the Speakers from stealing Kurzick relics.
Defeat the Speakers harvesting souls in the zu Heltzer cemetery.
Prevent gang poachers from claiming the corrupted moa.
Defeat the corrupted moa currently terrorizing people near the zu Heltzer ruins.
Help Jan Lutgardis cleanse the Lutgardis ruins with their ancestral songs.
Neutralize the haywire Gods' Vengeance.
Gather the needed sap to restore what might be the final Forever Tree.
Protect the sylvari trying to restore the final Forever Tree.

6297.name: Daily Kryta Fisher
6297.description: Fueling the engines of the economy.
6297.requirement: Gather raw materials by catching fish in the following locations: Queensdale, Kessex Hills, Gendarran Fields, Harathi Hinterlands, Bloodtide Coast, or Southsun Cove.

6368.name: Deadly Delicacies
6368.description: Maguuma-harvested mushrooms have become a trendy Canthan delicacy, and unscrupulous traders smuggled cartloads of them without performing safety inspections.
6368.requirement: Find and slay a newly arrived invasive species.

6403.name: Hatchery Helper
6403.description: Thanks to your help, these fish will get a chance at an "Extra Life."
6403.requirement: Help Conservationist An and Bubbles cull the invasive species.

6470.name: The Floor Is Void
6470.requirement: Avoid reaching 10 stacks of corruption during the fight with Soo-Won.

6476.name: New Kaineng Insight: Naksi Bay Ruins
6476.requirement: Discover this End of Dragons Mastery Insight in New Kaineng City.

6507.name: New Kaineng Insight: Pool of Tranquility
6507.requirement: Discover this End of Dragons Mastery Insight in New Kaineng City.

6519.name: Extracurricular Adventures
6519.requirement: Complete levels in Super Adventure Box or defeat any champion enemies across Tyria.

6547.name: Against the Alliance
6547.requirement: Stabilize Diessa Plateau against the Molten Alliance by completing events and returning audio logs to Agent Brandubh. Molten Alliance events award extra progress.

6549.name: Clarity
6549.requirement: Complete the Xunlai Jade Junkyard Strike Mission without taking damage from any hallucinations.

6637.name: Adventure Guide: Volume One
6637.requirement: Complete 14 of the 16 Adventure Guide: Volume One achievements.

6669.name: Discovering Points of Interest I
6669.requirement:
Discover  point of interest in Queensdale, Metrica Province, Caledon Forest, Wayfarer Foothills, or the Plains of Ashford.

<c=@reminder>Points of interest are special locations marked by name in the world, indicated by a square icon on the map. </c>

6768.name: League Participator—Conquest Season Thirty-Four
6768.requirement: Play  ranked matches during Conquest Season Thirty-Four.

6783.name: After the Battle
6783.requirement: Complete the story chapter After the Battle.

6809.name: Guarding the Fields 2
6809.requirement: Complete events in Gendarran Fields to safeguard settlements in the area.

6903.name: Energized Tools of the Luxon Hunters
6903.requirement: Unlock all of the Energized Luxon Hunter's weapons.

6919.name: Fast Break
6919.requirement: During the final battle of Gyala Delve, break the ravenous wanderer's defiance within a short period after its appearance or recovery.

6946.name: Demon Hunter
6946.description: Thank you for prepurchasing Guild Wars 2: Secrets of the Obscure.

6957.name: League Participator—Conquest Season Thirty-Eight
6957.requirement: Play  ranked matches during Conquest Season Thirty-Eight.

7039.name: Rank Doesn't Matter Here
7039.requirement: Defeat the champion bosses in the Bastions of Balance, the Natural, and the Celestial.

bits.text: Defeat the champion boss roaming around the Bastion of Balance.
Defeat the champion boss roaming around the Bastion of the Natural.
Defeat the champion boss roaming around the Bastion of the Celestial.

7116.name: Temple of Febe
7116.requirement: Complete the Temple of Febe Strike Mission.

7412.name: A Shadow in the Night
7412.requirement: Sneak through the camp without being caught.

7632.name: Iron Marches Rift Hunting
7632.requirement: Take down tier 1, tier 2, and tier 3 rift hunt targets in Iron Marches.

bits.text: Tier 1 Rift Hunt Target
Tier 2 Rift Hunt Target
Tier 3 Rift Hunt Target

7696.name: Consecrated Saryx Weapon Collector
7696.description: A healthy consecration routine helps your skin glow!
7696.requirement: Unlock all  Consecrated Saryx weapon skins by crafting or purchasing them from the trading post and binding them to you. Recipes can be purchased from Faction Provisioners in Inner Nayos after unlocking Saryx weapon skins.

7902.name: Reconquer the Retrospective Runaround (Weekly)
7902.requirement: Complete the Retrospective Runaround jumping puzzle in Sand Dune Caverns in the Silverwastes.

7913.name: Reliving the Seasons 2
7913.requirement: Complete pivotal story missions from Living World Season 2.

bits.text: Episode 1: Disturbance in Brisban Wildlands
Episode 1: Fallen Hopes
Episode 1: Cornered
Episode 2: Discovering Scarlet's Breakthrough
Episode 2: The Concordia Incident

Episode 8: The Mystery Cave

7949.name: Fort Ranik Veteran
7949.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

7950.name: Daily Tier 4 Lonely Tower
7950.requirement: Complete Lonely Tower at fractal scale 76 or higher.

7965.name: Tour of the Tower
7965.requirement: Explore all areas of the Wizard's Tower during the instance.

bits.text: 1. Watch the Kryptis play hide-and-seek.
2. View the fireworks being launched.
3. Explore the snow-filled hall.
4. Visit Mabon's room.
5. Visit the lawn with R'tchikk and Gladium's new friends.
6. Visit the Kryptis gathered on the lawn.
7. See the painting by Tyria's newest artist.
8. Party by the pool.
9. Visit the reliquary.
10. Admire the view by the telescope.

7966.name: Astral Salute
7966.requirement: Salute Frode when he enters the portal.

8000.name: Daily Tier 3 Lonely Tower
8000.requirement: Complete Lonely Tower at fractal scale 51 or higher.

8044.name: Wayfind Yourself Out
8044.requirement: Complete the Lonely Tower fractal on the Master tier.

8047.name: Voracious Reader
8047.requirement: Find the books and artifacts scattered around Zakiros.

bits.text: Memory in the Council of Houses chamber.
Memory in the sealed chamber.
Memory outside the throne room.
Book 1.
Book 2.
Book 3.
Book 4.
Book 5.
Book 6.

8101.name: Inner Nayos Explorer
8101.description: You've explored the deepest parts of the realm of dreams.
8101.requirement: Explore all areas in Inner Nayos.

bits.text: Memory's Hollow
The Forgotten Path
The Bleeding Wastes
Heitor's Dominion
Mourning's Shade
The Commons
Nyedra, Dreamer's Sanctum
The Old Settlement
Defiled Cradle

Spire of Dreams
Spire of Redemption

8148.name: True Ending: The Eleventh Hour
8148.requirement: Successfully complete the Into the Spider's Lair meta-event in Inner Nayos before beginning The Eleventh Hour.

8295.name: Lowland Shore Insight: Alessia's Secret
8295.requirement: Discover this Janthir Wilds Mastery Insight in Lowland Shore.

8330.name: (Repeatable) Lowland Shore: Autumn's Vale Renown Heart
8330.requirement: Successfully complete the Autumn's Vale Renown Heart on  unique days.

8482.name: Show Me Those Moves, Isgarren!
8482.description: If he didn't help with the Elder Dragons, do you really think he's going to join the dance circle?

8507.name: Blood Moon Weapon Collector
8507.requirement: Unlock all  Blood Moon weapon skins from Convergences: Mount Balrior in Janthir Wilds or by purchasing them from the Trading Post and binding them to you.

8671.name: League Slayer—Conquest
8671.requirement: Defeat  players in ranked matches during a Conquest season.

8706.name: Case 382: Titan Organ Smuggling
8706.description: One person's opportunist is another's entrepreneur.
8706.requirement: Complete each step to help Inspector Lutze solve the case.

bits.text: Read the letter from Chief Inspector Lutze.
Find Chief Inspector Lutze in Mantle's Arrival.
Find the crate of smuggled organs in Mantle's Arrival.
Return to Chief Inspector Lutze.
Lutze thinks there is a potential buyer among the elite of Divinity's Reach. Where do the rich like Lord Faren live again?
This is where the elite live; there must be something here.
You found a large amount of gold; looks like there is a note nearby.
The note ties Countess Cindy Breaud to the smuggling ring. Chief Inspector Lutze would like to see this.
Lutze thinks someone around Mantle's Arrival must be moving the organ crates around.
You found a crate of smuggled organs a charr was carrying, and it looks like there is a note nearby.
The note ties Saturninus Deepsmoke to the smuggling ring; Chief Inspector Lutze would like to see this.
Lutze's findings point toward a sylvari handling logistics. Question both suspects: Ylani and Isla.
You've talked to Ylani and Isla, but one is lying (or maybe both). Find a way to prove it.
Something about this report does not match up; it could have been doctored.
Something does not add up here. Return to Lutze once you figure out who is lying.
Lutze thinks there is a potential buyer around the docks in Lion's Arch.
The shipping manifests you found show Alden Wamser moving large sums of money. Interview him.
You've talked to Alden; it appears there is nothing suspicious about the money moving through Lion's Arch.
Lutze thinks some organs are making their way to Amnytas. You should poke around after helping the kodan destroy the titan organ sacs.
You've helped destroy some organs. Wait...is that someone hiding nearby?
You talked to Jaxi, but he gave nothing up. Maybe there is some evidence nearby?
The note ties Jaxi to the smuggling ring; Chief Inspector Lutze would like to see this.
You should talk to Chief Inspector Lutze about everything you found.
Lutze needs proof that the ringleader is Hedda the Cunning. Check out her former Lionguard post at Twinspur Haven.
You've made it to Twinspur Haven; there has to be something here.
You've found some hastily burned notes; putting them together you can barely make out the remnants of words: "Li-  -ch  -itt c-ve chest be-d -rone."
You found a chest with a massive amount of gold and notes from Hedda the Cunning; return to Lutze with this proof.
Lutze has what she needs to make the arrest. Good job, detective!

8710.name: Kinfall Challenge Mode
8710.description: Bling-9009 has received reports of your exploits and now carries new items!
8710.requirement: Defeat the final boss of the Kinfall fractal in challenge mode.

8781.name: Pure Soul
8781.requirement: Defeat Lextalion without being affected by Malefic Darkness for more than 10 seconds.
